repo_notes.content: dcyfr-ai-rag is a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system package providing vector search, document indexing, and semantic retrieval capabilities for AI agents. Integrates with @dcyfr/ai framework for context-aware agent responses.
repo_notes.author: DCYFR Workspace Agent

repo_notes.content: Core capabilities: Document chunking and embedding generation, vector database integration (Pinecone, Weaviate, local), semantic search with hybrid ranking, context retrieval for LLM prompts, incremental index updates, metadata filtering.
repo_notes.author: DCYFR Workspace Agent

repo_notes.content: Priority documentation: src/embeddings/ (embedding generation strategies), src/vectordb/ (vector database adapters), src/retrieval/ (search algorithms, ranking), src/chunking/ (document splitting strategies), src/indexing/ (incremental updates, batch processing).
repo_notes.author: DCYFR Workspace Agent

repo_notes.content: Integration patterns: Works with @dcyfr/ai agents to provide relevant context, supports custom document loaders, configurable chunking strategies (fixed-size, semantic, recursive), hybrid search (vector + keyword), metadata filtering for precision.
repo_notes.author: DCYFR Workspace Agent
